name: A Road Too Long
description:
This was just my first original game I made a few years back. Thought I'd post it to see what everyone thinks.

It's a short trail game based on the WW2 Operation Market-Garden. You play as a tank crew of the XXX corps that must travel the 64 miles to Arnhem to reinforce the paratroopers who landed there. It's not a long distance, but supplies will be short and logistics will be bad and of course, you're in a slow a** tank traveling through a warzone. It's not a glamorous adventure, but it's one your virtual tank crew will no doubt remember forever (or would, if they were sentient). 

Hopefully you guys enjoy and it's not too glitchy lol
